org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning
Interface ManagementProvisioningContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProvisioningContextImpl
public interface ManagementProvisioningContext

Provisioning context interface for management provisioning commands.

Since:
2.6.1
Author:
barakme

Method Summary
 String[] createManagementEnvironmentScript(org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails[] mds, ComputeTemplate template)
          Creates the Cloudify environment script for management machines.
 File getCloudFile()

Method Detail

createManagementEnvironmentScript

String[] createManagementEnvironmentScript(org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails[] mds,
                                           ComputeTemplate template)
                                           throws FileNotFoundException
Creates the Cloudify environment script for management machines.

Parameters:
mds - the management machine details.
template - the template to use for these management machine.
Returns:
the contents of each of the cloudify environment files, one per management server, in the same order as the machine details that were provided..
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If a provided key file does not exist.

getCloudFile

File getCloudFile()
Returns the directory where the cloud configuration was read.

Returns:
the cloud configuration directory.
